five, all girls, so my head is in the shape of an alien being. I am a full-time mom, and it is very hard on me.

I like all kinds. I can't really pick just one. What kind do you prefer?
I like some modern country music and rock.  what about you?  Any favorite genres?
I listen to a little bit of everything, but I'm more into rock, country, and metal. I especially like Bon Jovi.
Classic rock.  Do You have any faves?  I don't know too many new bands.
I'm really into Ibiza music lately, but I like to listen to everything. You?
I am an English rock fan. Rolling Stone calls me their master of music. Do you have a favorite band?
Anything but rap.  But who doesn't like music. There's more to life than how good or bad it is.
I like mostly electronic.  Disco is my favorite.  How about you?  What music do your like?  Do people often recommend?
I listen to lots of music. Just an important genre of mine. I like all kinds. I listened to a lot  in my car the other day.

dialog.text: That's a good one.  My favorite is Jimmy Hendrix.  Have you heard of him?
beam_texts: That's a good one.  My favorite is Jimmy Hendrix.  Have you heard of him?
Yes, I do have a favourite band.  My favourite band is The The Beatles.
I like Zepplin as well.  They were a huge influence on my teen years.  Black Sabbath is also really good.
I do like rock music. I like many bands. I don't have a specific band.
I like Zeppellin too!  They're pretty cool.  They were formed in 1962 by a couple of guys, right?
That's good.  Yes I like them as well.  How about you?  Led Zepelin are great.  Do they play any other genres?
I do, I love Robert Plant and the Led Zepelin too!  I also really like the rolling stones and the Rolling Stones.
I don't listen to a lot music. I work too much. I love listening to Nickleback though.
I enjoy a lot more instrumental music, but sometimes rock is good.  Led Zeplin is great, also.
I listen to a lot if rock and pop.  Bands like Adele and Nine Inch Nails

dialog.text: No, I haven't.  He was an American guitarist, bassist and vocalist.
beam_texts: No, I haven't.  He was an American guitarist, bassist and vocalist.
I have heard of Jimmy Hendrix, but never really listened to him. Do you know any artists that I should check out?
I have, he was a super amazing guitarist. He was born in 1942.
I do! I used to listen to him when I was a kid. He is probably my favorite guitarist.
I have heard of Jimmy, but I don't know much about him. He is a pioneer of the blues
He's a very talented musician, what's your favorite song of his?  I really like When I Was Your Man.
Yes, I actually saw him in concert when I was younger.  He's amazing!
I have. I like some of his songs, especially his version of "Breakfast Club".
No I haven't but I know he was an American artist. He died just after my birthday in 1973.
I have, he's a great rock guitarist. He was famous before his debut studio album, All-Stars, came out in 1962.

dialog.text: That's cool.  Do have a dog?  My dog is really important to me.
beam_texts: That's cool.  Do have a dog?  My dog is really important to me.
My favorite album of his was "Blues & Rhythm".  Have any favorites?
I'm a big fan of his cover of "Despacito".  I've never seen him live though.
I love music, I listen to it all the time.  Any good bands you recommend?
I would suggest looking up some of his songs.  There is a lot to discover in Hendricks work
I thought he was an a capella singer too, but apparently he could play guitar and piano as well.
That sounds very interesting.  Do they have any local bands where you live?  The closest I've come to a large group is that big music festival.
Oh, I see!  He is probably the most famous artist of his day.  Some say he invented blues
Oh wow.  That is awesome.  Maybe you should check him out some time.  But he really wasn't that successful.  Not to say he wasn't talented though
It was cool that Jimmy was in the band called The White album, that came out in 1973.

dialog.text: Yes, I have two miniature pinschers.  They are great dogs.  Are you married?
beam_texts: Yes, I have two miniature pinschers.  They are great dogs.  Are you married?
No, but I would love a dog. I live in an apartment, though. Where do you live?
I do have a new dog.  Her name is Lily.  She's a lab.
Yes, I have a husky.  She is a rescue dog.  They are wonderful.  How many do you do?
I have a shepherd dog.  One of my all-time favorites.  Who is your dog?
No, not any more.  They are such family members.  :)  What type of dog is yours?
I don't. I have heard they are so much work.  Any breed in particular?
I used to have a lab.  We had to get her away because she needed a lot more attention.
I've three dogs.  They are the reason I always take my dog to the park.  All of them love dogs.
I do not.  Not anymore, I gave my dog away.  Once my grandmother passed away my wife moved to a retirement community.

dialog.text: Yes, for 10 years.  How long have you been married?  What are your dogs names?
beam_texts: Yes, for 10 years.  How long have you been married?  What are your dogs names?
I am not. I spend most of my time with my dogs. Do you have any kids?
Nope, I am a single mom of a son.  How about you?  Are your parents together?
No, but my husband is a great man. We've been married for 32 years.  How about you?
No, not married.  How about you? Are you?  Are they gay? LOL.
Not yet.  We just graduated from college.  Where do you live?  I live in Boston.
No, not married yet.  Still in school, but ready to settle down when I'm old.
I am not married, I am too busy traveling and have a small apartment.  How about you?
I am married, I am also a mom to two children.  How about you?  I am guessing you are?
Yes, married to a great woman.  She also had a lot hobbies.  Which is great, I love spending time with her.

dialog.text: My husband and I have been married 10 years and we have a maltese dog named bella.
beam_texts: My husband and I have been married 10 years and we have a maltese dog named bella.
We have been married 12 years. My dog's name is Ace, how about you?
My husband and I got married at 19.  We're in our thirties.  His name is Matthew.  And yours?
We have been married for 30 years. My dogs are pepper and banana.  Who is your favorite person in the world?
My dogs name is Little Sean.  We got them as a gift from my wife's sister.
Two of my dogs are names Bill and Mitt.  Were you married before or after?
I've been married 34 years and my dogs names are Sammy and Molly.  Not a lot to name in life.
September 3, 2017, hence my cake day, lol.  His name is Fluffy.  10 years is a long time, congratulations.
Yes, in my teens I met my wife at a rock concert.  Our dogs name was Dexter and Aid.
My dogs names are patches and Ace.  We have been married 16 years. My husband wanted me to wait and be at least 30 before we got married.

dialog.text: Aw, that's adorable.  Congratulations!  What type of dog is Bella?
beam_texts: Aw, that's adorable.  Congratulations!  What type of dog is Bella?
That is a beautiful name!  I would love to see a picture of bella sometime.
Interesting!  I have always wanted a dog.  Just haven't had the time.  Maybe one day.
That's an awesome name for a dog.  We named our dog Thomas.  No other dog has been as great as him.
That's such a cute name.  In that case, you have probably named Bella Elizabeth as well.
What kind is bella?  A type of hunting dog? or a water dog?.  We have two hounds here.
That's cute!  Do your dogs eat crumbs when you're cooking?  One of mine likes eating crumbled pecans!
That is a very cute name.  Does bella have a sister named Tammy?  It is a double ear piercing for my dogs.
That is a beautiful name.  So far I have had cats named Corky and Lydia.  Cindy was an older cat who gave me her name.
That's adorable.  Maybe you should change your dogs name to Andrew, so that he can wear his brown and black outfit.  Lol

dialog.text: I don't have a lot of time to watch movies, since my schedule is pretty busy with school.
beam_texts: I don't have a lot of time to watch movies, since my schedule is pretty busy with school.
Yeah I haven't had the time lately, but I always go to the theater when I can. What's your favorite movie?
Yeah I go to the cinema a lot, I love the theatre.  I also love watching movies on television.
I do also. Which ones do you like to watch?   I really like Alien.
I love the movies, my family and I go a lot when I have free time. Which movie did you see this weekend?
Definitely! What's your favorite movie? I love Scream 4! Best movie of all time!
I love movies.  I usually watch the movies on my laptop when I am not busy studying.
I'm looking forward to it! Do you prefer a particular kind of movie? I love comedy but horror movies are my fave.
I just had to take my dog for a walk. We're getting too cold to walk.
Yeah, I bet the theater is much fun and some theater specialize in several films, so you can get a variety of experiences.

dialog.text: Makes sense. I wish I had time for school too. I've worked 3 different jobs, so I don;t get to see much.
beam_texts: Makes sense. I wish I had time for school too. I've worked 3 different jobs, so I don;t get to see much.
i see . but you can always plan a day for yourself . what are your favorite movies ?
well when you have the time, treat yourself . i go a few times per month . what are you studying ?
are you in college or already done with it?  I went to university, so I know how busy life can be.
that's too bad . what kind of schedule do you have ? are you in college ?  I'm a business administration major and I've worked 3 job
Where do you study at? I am on the second semester of my Business Administration classes and its pretty demanding.
well you could always watch them at home later, do you have any hobbies?  I like to read about crime and detective stories.
i agree, it's very hard to find time when school and work is so busy.  But, i believe it is important to find that time for yourself.
i understand . i do work 3 jobs . and with 3 kids too . they like movies . what kind of school you go to ?
I'm glad I have fewer free hours. what type of work are you in? my 3 jobs have gotten very heavy

dialog.text: What kind of work do you do? Do you like it? What do you think of it?
beam_texts: What kind of work do you do? Do you like it? What do you think of it?
Yeah, it's hard to balance things with work and school. What kind of work do you do?
Well, you are still in school. That's great! What kind of work do you do?
Ah, that must be hard. What is your favorite movie? I like Silence of the Lambs a lot.
That's too bad. Do you have any hobbies you enjoy? I like playing games. I love Pokemon.
That sucks. You'd think that having 3 jobs would make it easier for you to see the movie.
I am studying business administration, so hopefully I'll find a job in my career. I need to be a good employee.
Yea, my friends always want me to go watch movies with them since I rarely have any free time.
Me either. I'm in college, so that's why I don have time to work. I have to see many different kinds of movies.
That is definitely rough. You need to find time to relax. That's why I took classes to help me study for school.

dialog.text: I'm an accountant, and I like it well enough. Some days are more busy than others though.
beam_texts: I'm an accountant, and I like it well enough. Some days are more busy than others though.
I work in a factory. The pay is okay, I guess. The commute is horrid though.
I've been a CEO of a large company for 5 years, so i love my job.
I work in a warehouse and it can be hard, but I like being physical. It's hard work, but rewarding.
I do programming, but I'd like to become an engineer one day. I like it, it can be very rewarding.
I work at a funeral home. It's ok but I don`t really like it. I think I should look into other types of work. What kind do you like?
I work in finance. It's an interesting job, and I like it. I get to travel a lot, and meet new people. It would be pretty boring if I was a housewife, though.
I work in medical field. I enjoy it. I hate how physical the job is. It gets my heart racing.
I work in my local movie theater, at a theater for 4 years. And I enjoy it very much.
I work in IT. I enjoy working on the phone, I guess. It doesn't feel that good tho. How about you?

dialog.text: I see, how long have you been an accountants? And does your work have long hours?
beam_texts: I see, how long have you been an accountants? And does your work have long hours?
I can imagine. I enjoy going to movies, but I always get distracted by the sound.
Accounting seems like a challenging job to get into. Especially with how many numbers there are to count.
That must be difficult. I know that there are more than 4 million people in the U.S. working as accountants.
I would imagine it's busy for sure. Is accounting difficult? I'm thinking about going into it.
I hope I get to a place where I could do that. I love accounting, I just hate the work.
That's true. I'm also an accountent, and the accounting industry is very busy. But it's definitely rewarding, and it sounds like you really enjoy it.
I have a friend that was an accounting assistant at a big company. I guess it's very busy, but still is busy.
Accountants are important, that is for sure. At least, you aren't accountant wen one lol
That's good! Accounting has really been making in recent years, due to technology being available and the potential to leverage material to individuals.

dialog.text: I've been an auditor for about five years. No, my job does not have long work hours.
beam_texts: I've been an auditor for about five years. No, my job does not have long work hours.
I've been an intern in accounting for 4 years, and yes, it can get very stressful.
My whole life. Some of my work is long, but others are short. I work as a freelance accountant.
I've been doing it for about 12 years. The hours aren't bad, but the pay is lower than most jobs.
I've been in it for 6 years. It doesn't have very long hours, but it is somewhat rewarding.
I've been in this line of work for 7 years. I don t have long hour hours, so its nice.
Since I was little, and my work doesn't have long enough hours. Accounting requires hard work.
About 10 years now. And, no, not at all, accounting jobs can actually be pretty laid back.
Since I was 18, it does take some time to learn all the things. Some people think accounting is easy, but it's not for me. I have a hard time dealing with numbers.
I've been an auditor for 8 years. It is hour-thousing, but if I can make some extra money, I do.

dialog.text: That's great, you must have a ton of energy. What else do you like to do?
beam_texts: That's great, you must have a ton of energy. What else do you like to do?
I see. Are you a full time auditor? I know the hours can get pretty long.
I see. What do your colleagues think about it? I bet they aren't fond of it.
Are there many deadlines when you work as an audit? And do you like your job?
Do you work on saturdays? Do people ever ask you to do their taxes? That must get annoying.
How many hours do you work? What kind do you like to do?  Sorry, I really have no life haha
Oh, that's cool. Does your auditor get to help with taxes? If so, what do you like about being an auditory?
That sounds very stressful. Do you find you have a very comfortable life?  I do not mind a long day.
What kinds of things do you audit? A company, a specific type of business? ie a company owner or an accounting firm?
You said some days are busy, is that in regards to auditing clients? Like work to be completed quickly?
